external_games.name: Tachyon Dreams II: The Bloated Can of Space Root Beer

name: Tachyon Dreams II: The Bloated Can of Space Root Beer
summary: The adventures of Dodger through space and time continue! Previously a dish washer (person, not a machine!) onboard Space Station Penrose, Dodger must travel the space-time continuum and inter-dimensional highways to save the universe from the Tgorodians, a bunch of time-travelling thugs in search of the fabled Garden World!
